title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct research on existing philosophical texts and wisdom sources. Identify target use cases and scenarios for the AI system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for the Wisdom Distillation Engine. This includes components for text processing, knowledge extraction, reasoning, decision-making, and user interaction. Data models, workflows, and system interfaces should be defined, considering scalability, maintainability, and performance requirements. For this RFC, also outline the expected integration points with external APIs, potential edge cases, and strategies for handling them. Additionally, suggest suitable data structures and algorithms for each component, detailing their pros and cons.

title: Data Acquisition and Preprocessing
description: Identify and acquire relevant philosophical texts and wisdom sources. Preprocess the data for further analysis and knowledge extraction.

title: Knowledge Extraction and Representation
description: Develop algorithms and models to extract practical wisdom and knowledge from the acquired texts. Define knowledge representation formats and ontologies.

title: Reasoning and Decision-Making Engine
description: Implement the reasoning and decision-making components of the AI system. Develop algorithms to apply the extracted wisdom to real-world scenarios and situations.

title: User Interface and Experience Design - RFC
description: Design the user interface and experience for interacting with the WisdomDistillationEngine AI system. Define input and output formats, create wireframes and mockups, consider accessibility and usability principles to ensure the interface is intuitive and easy to use for a diverse range of users. Address feedback from previous RFCs, especially those related to improving user-friendly elements and incorporating design patterns that facilitate seamless interaction with the system.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the user interface and experience based on the approved designs. Integrate with the backend components and APIs.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing philosophical texts, extracted knowledge, user data, and metadata. Ensure data integrity, performance, and scalability by leveraging a combination of document-oriented (MongoDB) and relational (PostgreSQL) databases. Use MongoDB for unstructured text data and PostgreSQL for structured data. Implement caching mechanisms at both the database level (e.g., Redis) and in-memory caching within application code. Develop data access layers and APIs that follow REST principles and best practices, utilizing data partitioning and sharding strategies for improved performance and scalability. Ensure data privacy by following security best practices.

title: Integration and System Testing
description: Integrate all components of the AI system and perform comprehensive system testing. Validate the functionality, performance, and accuracy of the knowledge extraction and decision-making processes.

title: Security and Privacy Audit
description: Conduct a thorough security and privacy audit of the AI system. Identify and mitigate potential risks and vulnerabilities, ensuring data privacy and system integrity.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure and processes for the AI system. Implement monitoring, logging, and automated deployment pipelines.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the AI system. Include installation instructions, usage examples, and API references.
